TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RadioButton extends System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase

summary.span: 允許使用者從一組選項中選取單一選項，與其他 控制項搭配。

span.span: Enables the user to select a single option from a group of choices when paired with other controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以顯示文字、 ，或兩者。The control can display text, an , or both. 當使用者選取一個選項按鈕 （也稱為選項按鈕） 群組內時，會自動清除其他。When the user selects one option button (also known as a radio button) within a group, the others clear automatically. 所有控制項中指定的容器，例如，構成一組。All controls in a given container, such as a , constitute a group. 若要建立一種形式的多個群組，將每個群組在它自己的容器中，這類或控制項。To create multiple groups on one form, place each group in its own container, such as a or control. 和控制項有類似的函式： 它們會提供使用者可以選取或清除的選擇。 and controls have a similar function: they offer choices a user can select or clear. 其差異在於，多個相同的時間，可以同時選取控制項，但是是互斥的選項按鈕。The difference is that multiple controls can be selected at the same time, but option buttons are mutually exclusive. 使用屬性來取得或設定狀態的。Use the property to get or set the state of a . 可以改變選項按鈕的外觀，以顯示切換式按鈕或是以標準選項按鈕，藉由設定屬性。The option button's appearance can be altered to appear as a toggle-style button or as a standard option button by setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化兩個中的控制項。The following code example creates and initializes two controls in a . 此範例會使用要追蹤的事件已選取，並報告的所選文字當使用者按一下。The example uses the event to track which is selected and reports the text of the selected when the user clicks a . 若要執行此範例中，程式碼貼到 Windows 表單上。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form. 呼叫`InitializeRadioButtons`從表單的建構函式或事件處理方法。Call `InitializeRadioButtons` from the form's constructor or the event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設檢視其對齊按鈕右邊的文字和屬性設定為`true`。The default view of the has its text aligned to the right of the button and the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化、 為其提供切換按鈕的外觀、 設定其屬性設`false`，並將它加入。The following code example creates and initializes a , gives it the appearance of a toggle button, sets its property to `false`, and adds it to a . [!code-csharp[Classic RadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButton Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButton Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，決定 的外觀。

span.span: Gets or sets a value determining the appearance of the .
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值設定為，然後在循環的核取方塊繪製控制項。If the value is set to , then the control is drawn with a circular check box. 如果值設定為，然後在做為可切換的控制項繪製為向上或向下狀態。If the value is set to , then the is drawn as a control that can be toggled to an up or down state. 其中一種類型可以顯示文字、 影像，或兩者。Either type can display text, an image, or both. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化、 為其提供切換控制項的外觀、 設定其屬性設`false`，並將它加入。The following code example creates and initializes a , gives it the appearance of a toggle control, sets its property to `false`, and adds it to a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`RadioButton1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RadioButton1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#535](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#535)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#535](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#535)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出當按一下控制項時， 值和控制項的外觀是否自動變更。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value and the appearance of the control automatically change when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果 值和控制項的外觀會在 事件上自動變更，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the value and the appearance of the control automatically change on the event; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值設定為`false`，則控制項部分必須簽入中的程式碼事件處理常式。If the value is set to `false`, the portion of the control must be checked in code in the event handler. 此外，如果屬於控制項群組，此屬性可確保只是其中一個控制項已在指定的時間。In addition, if the is part of a control group, this property ensures that only one of the controls is checked at a given time. 如果屬性設定為`false`的群組控制項將不會當做互斥的群組和必須更新程式碼中的屬性。If the property is set to `false`, a group of controls will not act as a mutually exclusive group and the property must be updated in code. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化、 為其提供切換控制項的外觀、 設定其屬性設`false`，並將它加入。The following code example creates and initializes a , gives it the appearance of a toggle control, sets its property to `false`, and adds it to a . [!code-csharp[Classic RadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButton Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButton Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何屬性可以在執行階段變更。The following code example demonstrates how the property can be changed at run time. 核取方塊部分移至文字的左右時值變更。The check box portion of a is moved to the right or left of the text when the value changes. 這個範例需要控制具現化表單上的參考命名空間已包含在內。This example requires that a control has been instantiated on a form and that a reference to the namespace has been included. [!code-cpp[Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RadioButton.OnCheckedChanged Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.
